name: MADchen
description:
MADchen is a puzzle game for Windows, Mac and Linux. You walk a girl through her own nightmare, exploring the rooms of a haunted house.

Your goal is to exit rooms by turning on the lights - what seems to be scary when it's dark might not be scary afterall as soon as it's illuminated.

Your little teddy is the only support you have to get you by the wicked creatures you will meet.

But move carefully... A hasty step can be your last one.

madchen-game.com

Features
  • Atmospheric, dreamy graphic style
  • Increasingly difficult levels (currently there are 9)
  • Changing surroundings depending on the light sources in the room
  • Terrifying creatures
  • A teddy as your most important companion, who can
    • distract Monsters
    • be a light source
    • ...
  • Different kind of light sources with different behaviour
    • Overhead
    • Desk Lamp
    • Candles
    • ...
  • Wondrous objects
    • Teleporting mirrors
    • Hiding chests
    • ...
